rows.value: Default table shows all data with sortable columns

Authoring options can be used to specify which columns to show, include a search box, and set default sort column.
Styling can be used to fix the scrollable size of the table

rows.comments:
display_columns - comma-separated list of columns to display (order preserved)

show_search - include a box to search and filter data

sort_default - initial sort column. Default sort 'asc' order, unless 'desc' specified

max-height style can force the table to scroll within a fixed space
Rendering the full data set can be a little resource intensive, so only do so when required
Recommended to restrict the max-height displayed for more performant scrolling
